com.mongodb.client

接口 MongoIterable<TResult>

  • 类型参数:
    TResult - The type that this iterable will decode documents to.
    所有超级接口:
    java.lang.Iterable<TResult>
    所有已知子接口:
    AggregateIterable<TResult>, DistinctIterable<TResult>, FindIterable<TResult>, GridFSFindIterable, ListCollectionsIterable<TResult>, ListDatabasesIterable<TResult>, ListIndexesIterable<TResult>, MapReduceIterable<TResult>

    public interface MongoIterable<TResult>
extends java.lang.Iterable<TResult>
    The MongoIterable is the results from an operation, such as a query.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.0

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MongoIterable<TResult> batchSize(int batchSize)
      Sets the number of documents to return per batch.
      TResult first()
      Helper to return the first item in the iterator or null.
      void forEach(Block<? super TResult> block)
      Iterates over all documents in the view, applying the given block to each.
      <A extends java.util.Collection<? super TResult>>
      A      		 into(A target)
      Iterates over all the documents, adding each to the given target.
      MongoCursor<TResult> iterator() 
      <U> MongoIterable<U> map(Function<TResult,U> mapper)
      Maps this iterable from the source document type to the target document type.

      • 从接口继承的方法 java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, spliterator

    • 方法详细资料

      • iterator

        MongoCursor<TResult> iterator()
        指定者:
        iterator 在接口中 java.lang.Iterable<TResult>

      • first

        TResult first()
        Helper to return the first item in the iterator or null.
        返回:
        T the first item or null.

      • map

        <U> MongoIterable<U> map(Function<TResult,U> mapper)
        Maps this iterable from the source document type to the target document type.
        类型参数:
        U - the target document type
        参数:
        mapper - a function that maps from the source to the target document type
        返回:
        an iterable which maps T to U

      • forEach

        void forEach(Block<? super TResult> block)
        Iterates over all documents in the view, applying the given block to each.

        Similar to map but the function is fully encapsulated with no returned result.

        参数:
        block - the block to apply to each document of type T.

      • into

        <A extends java.util.Collection<? super TResult>> A into(A target)
        Iterates over all the documents, adding each to the given target.
        类型参数:
        A - the collection type
        参数:
        target - the collection to insert into
        返回:
        the target

      • batchSize

        MongoIterable<TResult> batchSize(int batchSize)
        Sets the number of documents to return per batch.
        参数:
        batchSize - the batch size
        返回:
        this
        MongoDB documentation
        Batch Size
